column4: Hello! I was trying to install qjoypad and followed the instructions in the install notes. It said it needed Qt4.0 or greater, so I installed Qt4.7.4. But it refuses to recognize it thus won't obey the ./config command. What can I do to make it work?
I'd really appreciate the help. Someone?
you need the dev package installed too
you need the dev package installed too
Paste the error message you are getting in pastebin and gimme the URL
I showed you the download page.
Thanks for taking time to help me. This is the error message: http://pastebin.com/0hQGD3Yb and this is where I got my Qt from: http://qt.nokia.com/downloads
ok I will tak ea look
The online installer for the Linux/x11.
what version of qt you have installed?
Is there a command I should use to check that?
yeah dpkg -l | grep -i qt   will show you
